mapper.select: SELECT POPUP_KEY, NAME, WIDTH, HEIGHT, X as LEFT, Y as TOP, START_DATE, END_DATE, IS_SHOW FROM T_POPUP ORDER BY POPUP_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY
SELECT A.LINK_KEY, B.NAME as GoodsName FROM T_LINK_KEY A INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY B ON A.REQ_KEY = B.CTG_KEY WHERE A.REQ_TYPE = 100 AND A.RES_TYPE = 300 AND A.RES_KEY = #{popupKey}

SELECT COUPON_MASTER_KEY, TYPE, NAME, DC_TYPE, DC_VALUE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ISSUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')|| ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE_USE FROM T_COUPON_MASTER WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND COUPON_MASTER_KEY = #{searchText}
ORDER BY COUPON_MASTER_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY
SELECT A.* FROM T_LINK_KEY A WHERE A.REQ_TYPE = 100 AND A.RES_TYPE = 400 AND A.RES_KEY = #{couponKey}

SELECT COUPON_MASTER_KEY, NAME, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as INDATE, TYPE, NAME, DC_TYPE, DC_VALUE, CONTENTS, PERIOD_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as END_DATE, LIMIT_PRICE_MIN, LIMIT_DAY, IS_SHOW, DEVICE FROM T_COUPON_MASTER WHERE coupon_master_key = #{couponMasterKey}
